rows.text:
ParentApp for Kids Tanzania is a collaboration between the Institute for Life Course Health Research (ILCHR) at Stellenbosch University in South Africa, the Regional
Psychosocial Support Network (REPSSI) Tanzania and the National Institute for Medical Research (NIMR) Tanzania. The app was developed in partnership with IDEMS International as part of the Global Parenting Initiative, funded by the LEGO Foundation. The content herein is available under an open source Creative Commons International 4.0 license. It was developed in collaboration with key partners:

The app was developed in partnership with IDEMS International as part of the Global Parenting Initiative, funded by the LEGO Foundation.
